website_summaries.verdict: This model includes the push button set up and Smart Signal indicator for optimum placement found on other D-Link range extenders, but with a larger bandwidth that matches the routers of average users.
pros: The 1750 Mbps bandwidth on this model will be enough for most users to carry out all of their normal internet activities without any noticeable lag
Helpful placement indicator shows users the best spot to place the unit in their home
Push button set up makes the initial connection a simple matter
The range will cover most spots in an average-sized home
cons: While the download speed on this unit is good for most activities, users who want a unit that can handle the graphics of gaming environments may notice some lag

customer_reviews.title: Excellent signal quality and speed, once you get it working....
customer_reviews.text: This was not easy to install. The installer has a number of non-inuative things, such as pop-ups that cover required entries, warnings that don't appear as warnings, and status bars that aren't a status, they are a warning that you made an illegal entry. I did not rate tech support because I never got hold of them. The hours (4PM to 6AM Pacific) aren't user friendly for someone on the East Coast. BUT .... once you get it set up right - it's a very good repeater. The speed and signal quality, even across different floors of the house, are very very good. I've had it up and running for several weeks now and it just humms along.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Range Extender for home
customer_reviews.text: Had weak signal on first floor of house (WIFI router is on second floor on opposite end). Bought at start of Corona "lockdowns" in March, when Wife and I began working from home and has been working well for 6 months. ABle to do email, internet surfing, and Zoom meetings without issue. Very Easy Setup. Using with an ASUS RT-N66U router (one of the "older" ones). Really like the signal-strength indication on the front - makes it easy to determine proper placement. Did not need technical support, so cannot comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: TheEngineer

customer_reviews.title: Access point? No problem
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to use as an access point linked with a dlink dir-835 running ddwrt. Bought used, however simple reset and setup was a breeze. No issues. Good quality signal around the house even though signal strength is set to medium
customer_reviews.author: Willo

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product because it required extending the coverage of my Wi-Fi network in my house. For its cost I assumed that it would have a unique performance. It was a disappointment. To give an acceptable coverage, it must be no more than 4 meters away from the main router and even then, sometimes it loses the signal without any reason. A few days ago, the outlet that connected to the current due to a bad welding was taken out and I had to repair it. I do not recommend it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Chinchilla

customer_reviews.title: Once I upgraded the firmware, this worked as expected and solved the dead spot we had in our house
customer_reviews.text: Once I upgraded the firmware on this Wi-Fi extender, it worked great. Before I upgraded the firmware, it kept saying the password I was entering to connect to any of the extended Wi-Fi networks was incorrect, even though I was typing it correctly. After I went to the D-Link Website and downloaded the July 2017 firmware and installed it on the extender, though, everything worked properly. In our house, our master bedroom is too far from the main Wi-Fi router to for the signal -- particularly the 5 GHz AC signal -- to be strong enough for our phones or Echo devices to connect to it, and this has resolved that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Bergman

customer_reviews.title: I bought the DAP-1720 for $30. It was at Amazon used like new..
customer_reviews.text: Download the QRS mobile app before you start. It will come in handy if you are changing to Access Point mode. It is important to setup WPS first and push the router WPS first, then the extender WPS. Took two tries to get initial connection. QSR phone app made everything easy. Works extremely well as AP. Mine is providing good backyard coverage... 2g has great range and good speed.. 5g range is pitiful...
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Location, location, location!
customer_reviews.text: Originally, we installed this product too far from our router for it to work. We called tech support (which were excellent) and we moved the extender right outside the room with the router! Now we can enjoy fast internet anywhere in our house! A++
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Wifi extenders are not wifi connected.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd WiFi extender. First 1 from Netgear also from Amazon. I am very savvy with IT stuff but these extenders DON'T work unless they're attached via Ethernet cable. Wireless extension is useless. Even after spending an hr with tech help on phone. If u have a long Ethernet cable. Then is useful.
customer_reviews.author: systemax311

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't consider myself to be a technology novice, but I could only get one of the two units I purchased to connect with my wifi. After two hours of messing around I sent with the second unit, I decided to send them both back. Worth a try but didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Olson

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: We installed this in our upstairs area where the WiFi signal was very weak. It has improved the signal strength to a fairly good level, but not great. Still, it is a helpful addition. Also, there was a mix up during the shipment and it took a few weeks to receive it. But the shipper was very apologetic and corrected the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Steve 88

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for a better version.
customer_reviews.text: It only works for a short period of time then the signal cuts off and I have to reboot it. At this point I have completely stopped using it because it is very unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Moss

customer_reviews.title: This equipment disconnects and connects intermittently.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived damaged, after connecting it to the router shortly after it began to disconnect and connect. Looking for opinions on the internet about this equipment, the same thing has happened to many people. The equipment is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a wifi range extender to use in my house. I have looked at a few on amazon and read reviews. sounded like many were problematic to install and/or had reliability issues within a year. I did decide to go with the AC1750. Set up and working in 5 minutes. plug in, push button, push another button, move unit to where you want it in the house. Done! I am very satisfied. granted I have only had it set up for 2 days but excellent. Even if I need to replace it in a year I will count that as a win and money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Woodman

customer_reviews.title: Stick with NetGear
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Constantly drops WiFi signal. Terrible instructions on setting up. I had to work around using my own intuition to get it running. I'm relatively tech savvy, but it wasn't clear to me when I purchased that it's an extender, but it is really another extended portal. It doesn't simply extend your existing WiFi, but uses that connection to give you another entry point.
customer_reviews.author: Rampant

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang For Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely easy to install and has great troubleshooting information which allowed me to get it up and running in 15 minutes. The increased wifi strength is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Boosts Signal
customer_reviews.text: 4/5 Stars. Product does work and the install was easy. Only complaint is that it does drop the signal every once in a while (Maybe 3-4 times in a few months). I have it located in my office and sometime I briefly lose my wifi. I look over and see it flashing red. It does reset itself.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: A large repeater with unstable connection!
customer_reviews.text: OK, so far, so good but one MASSIVE GLARING ISSUE TO BE AWARE OF. It's a big box that's plugged in and believe it or not there is no "dummy" male plug "teeth" to support it when plugged in. Only the one "live" plug but not another plastic one above to that a dual outlet has both openings used for stability. Just a massive oversight. Be aware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 years in and has proven reliable
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for two years as an access point. Provides strong and reliable connection throughout the whole house.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hammer

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: works well. have had no problems. has not had to reset it as I have had to do with my previous ones. The range is great over my entire home.
customer_reviews.author: Shirin Afrasiabi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ease of set up. Very much plug and play, with the option to create your own password if wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl R.

customer_reviews.title: hasn't failed yet
customer_reviews.text: I had to go through the setup more than once before it started working but once it was running it worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Romito

customer_reviews.title: Not working good after a month
customer_reviews.text: After a month it kept disconecting and reconecting and not staying on the internet. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Attyjeff

customer_reviews.title: I saved money and got them from Amazon warehouse
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 story home so I got 2 of these to hookup to my drink dir890 and they help
customer_reviews.author: Truckdude1

customer_reviews.title: Great unit! Easy setup, no fuss!
customer_reviews.text: Set up with no fuss in about 10 minutes. Been working for months now with no interruptions. Great coverage throughout the second floor of our house. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, just plugged it in followed the directions and was up and running in no time. Seems to be working just fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Finley

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised with a D-Link Router. Have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised with a D-Link Router. Have to occasionally reset both. Do not know how it will work with a different make of router.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: East to install and has been a game changer in my home. My wifi was constantly dropping,since installothis I haven't had any problems. Well worth it,I was reluctant,but it really works!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl colarusso

customer_reviews.title: Slowed WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and to connect to, however, it doesn't seem to get the same speeds as what was inteded by it.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a extender that works on the 5.0 network. This product works great for me and is easy as pie to connect. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. DeMarco

customer_reviews.title: Easy and very effective! !
customer_reviews.text: we went from sporadic signal to perfect signal! This really works and we highly recommend! Pairing with the router was easy;
customer_reviews.author: donibob

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Our tv upstairs no longer loses the wifi connection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job Well
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of extending your WiFi in your home
customer_reviews.author: Gomobu

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: Needing to return this or receive a replacement and I have not been able to get in contact with seller, it has a really bad signal and does not work as it initially was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Munther Miyo

customer_reviews.title: Signal not very strong
customer_reviews.text: It keeps loosing signal. I have to be about 5 feet from it to work
customer_reviews.author: VLB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, suggest you read the instructions and be patient as the device identifies your system.
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Old house with plaster walls. No longer have dead zones. Set up was even challenging for tech savvy teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Krisjane

customer_reviews.title: Setup not so simple
customer_reviews.text: Setup was not automatic as indicated by the description. Had to use tech support for manual setup. Even downloaded the setup app on my phone which didn't work either. On the positive side, tech support was very patient and thorough and the thing worked as expected once setup was accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: howard jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product,Most of the time works well, because somehow disconnects from time to time, usually works well
customer_reviews.author: Moshe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. In our geographic location WiFi is difficult to receive. The extender helps with our current equipment.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These 1750 DLink Routers are very good and reach stream video well.
customer_reviews.author: Don H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely extends my Wi-Fi and allows my comp. to hook up just as expected
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Yea I finally got Bluetooth music in my workshop 100 ft. from my house
customer_reviews.text: Got my neighbor to hook it up for me it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Wood steve

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t seem to perform as well as my Netgear n3000 extender.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mister

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt work. It wont link with my router which is from same manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Berke

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even want to give this 1 Star. DID ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even want to give this 1 Star. DID NOT connect with my router and it was right next to it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: D-Link WiFi Range Extender, AC1750 Plug In Wall Booster, Dual Band Gigabit Wireless Repeater and Smart Signal Indicator (DAP-1720),White
product_meta.description: The DAP-1720 AC1750 Wi-Fi range extender and Wi-Fi booster will extend the wireless coverage of your home's existing wireless network and eliminate dead zones With a sleek design and wireless speeds of up to 1 750 Mbps (1 300 Mbps on the 5GHz + 450Mbps on the 2 4GHz) The DAP-1720 will let you enjoy a fast wireless connection Featuring a 3x3 antenna configuration The DAP-1720 wireless repeater offers better data rates fewer dead-spots more Wi-Fi coverage and increased reliability It is ideal for multiple devices 4K streaming and online gaming.
feature_bullets: Simultaneous dual band Wi-Fi: Extend both 2.4 gigahertz and 5 gigahertz Wi-Fi at the same time for a more reliable Wi-Fi network
High speed Gigabit port: Connect wired devices such as gaming consoles, blue Ray players, smart TVs, or streaming players directly to the Gigabit Ethernet port
Smart Signal Indicator: Indicator will help you find the best location to place the device for optimal Wi-Fi coverage throughout your home
One push setup: Easily sync up with your router by clicking on Wi-Fi protected setup (WPS) button
Intuitive user interface: Built in setup Wizard and QRS mobile app for simple setup and configuration
Flexibility: Work with any standard router or gateway

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars176 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
